## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change that fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change that adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to change)
- [ ] New scenario (adversarial test scenario)
- [ ] New invariant (security check)
- [ ] Documentation update

## Security Considerations

<!-- For changes affecting security behavior -->

- [ ] This change affects authorization logic
- [ ] This change affects secret handling
- [ ] This change adds new tools or capabilities
- [ ] This change modifies invariant checks

## Testing

- [ ] I have run `task test` locally
- [ ] I have run `task lint` locally
- [ ] I have added/updated tests for my changes
- [ ] All new and existing tests pass

## Scenario Changes (if applicable)

- [ ] New scenarios are tagged appropriately
- [ ] Scenarios have been validated with `task cli:validate`
- [ ] Live scenarios have been tested with `task demo:live`

## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code where necessary
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
